sentences.sContent: This is an algorithm solidification simulation about"multiple nodal region"in boundary node of casting and mold system.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is an algorithm solidification simulation about"multiple nodal region"in boundary node of casting and mold system.
sentences.sCn: 本文研究了铸件铸型体系中异类材料分界面上“复合节点领域”的凝固计算。

sentences.sContent: To test solidification characteristics of various casting alloy accurately is very significant for optimizing casting technique and getting castings with sound property and appropriate dimensions.
sentences.sContent_eng: To test solidification characteristics of various casting alloy accurately is very significant for optimizing casting technique and getting castings with sound property and appropriate dimensions.
sentences.sCn: 精确测定不同铸造合金的凝固特性对于优化铸造工艺、获得满足性能和尺寸要求的铸件具有十分重要的意义。

sentences.sContent: At this moment, my heart, to the surprisingly calm, memories, when the snow together make a snowman, snowball fights, sad tears with falling snow, fall in the snow, the instantaneous solidification.
sentences.sContent_eng: At this moment, my heart, to the surprisingly calm, memories, when the snow together make a snowman, snowball fights, sad tears with falling snow, fall in the snow, the instantaneous solidification.
sentences.sCn: 此时此刻，我的心，出奇的平静，予回想里，那年雪里一起堆雪人，打雪仗，伤心的眼泪随着飘落的雪花，跌落在雪地里，瞬间凝固。

words.tran: 坚固地；坚硬地；团结一致地
凝固，团结（solidify的过去式和过去分词形式）
使凝固（solidify的ing形式）；使团结；使充实
